Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a vertex in a 3D model.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • calcNormal

        public NormalVector calcNormal​()
        Calculates the normal vector for the vertex.

        This uses the list of adjacent faces to create a normal vector. It does this by averaging the normals of the adjacent faces and then normalizing the length of the resultant vector.

        Returns:
        a NormalVector object representing the normal vector of the vertex
        Since:
        1.0
